pageTitle: Welcome back, {{name}}! Check out your learning progress
subject: Subject
selectHeatmapPrompt: Please select a metric to display your heatmap.

recommendations.streak: You're on a {{count}} {{dayLabel}} learning streak – keep it up!
recommendations.avgTime: You learn an average of {{hours}} hours and {{minutes}} minutes per day – great consistency!
recommendations.morning: You are particularly focused and learn most effectively in the morning.
recommendations.afternoon: You show the most learning activity in the afternoon – a productive time!
recommendations.evening: You concentrate and learn the most in the evening – ideal for quiet study phases.
recommendations.activeDay: Your most active learning day is {{day}}.
recommendations.quizTotal: You have answered a total of {{count}} quiz questions – great participation!
recommendations.quizAccuracy: Your quiz accuracy is {{percent}}% – keep it up!
recommendations.quizTimeAccuracy: Your quiz performance is best in the {{slot}} – great concentration during this time!
recommendations.trendUp: Your learning time has increased compared to last week – keep going!
recommendations.trendDown: Your learning time has slightly decreased compared to last week – stay on track!
